sources.title: A Husband For Christmas | Full Movie | Vivica A. Fox | Christmas 2023
sources.description:
A Husband For Christmas - Two co-workers agree to a loveless marriage of convenience, but as they become acquainted, an unrealized chemistry grows between them.
2016.  Stars: Vivica A. Fox, Ricco Ross, Eric Roberts

metadata.Plot: Due to a family tradition, Emily's sister Jasmine must get married before Christmas in order for her own wedding which is scheduled for the day after Christmas to hold - in light of this, Jasmine must now find a way to get married...
metadata.Actors: Ivy Antiev, Grace-Charis Bassey, Chudy Davidson
